name: Cat 'n' Mouses
description:
A multiplayer VR game where the VR player is the cat who needs to stop those pesky mouses (PC players) from stealing his cheese. The cat can throw, smash and barricade the mice to stop them from taking cheese back to the mouse hole.

Currently a prototype this game was created in two weeks by a two man team for the TV game jam inspired by cartoons like Tom and Jerry with a little itchy and scratchy for good measure.

This game needs a SteamVR compatible headset. If you don't have a SteamVR compatible headset attached to your computer and SteamVR running  the game will not run correctly.
